about_the_game:
Help Cael discover the answers he seeks as he faces the most challenging mountain of his life. In Amarela, you will jump, climb and overcome obstacles in a breathtaking world, where every step is an achievement and every fall brings new learning.

With precise controls and refined mechanics, Amarela offers an intense and rewarding experience, perfect for those seeking exciting challenges. Find hidden secrets, unravel an engaging narrative through details of the environment and discover what drives Cael on his journey to the top.

Key features:

A moving narrative: Discover the meaning behind Cael's journey, told through delicate and reflective moments.

Immersive environment: Climb a living mountain, full of visual details, abandoned objects and soundtracks that evoke intense emotions.

Challenging and fluid gameplay: Overcome obstacles while facing the gravity of the mountain — and the emotional gravity that ties the characters to the past.

Discover untold stories: Explore the trails left by other climbers and connect with your own questions about faith and self-discovery.

Get ready to test your skills and determination. Can you reach the top and find the answers Cael is searching for? Come find out!

Minimum:

  • Processor: Dual-core de 2,0 GHz ou superior.
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU com suporte a OpenGL 2.1 (NVIDIA GeForce 6000 Series, AMD Radeon HD 2000 Series, ou equivalente).
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX
